changeSet.author: StÃ©phan.Minko
changeSet.sql:
create table data.oauth_client_details ( id uuid not null constraint oauth_client_details_pkey primary key, created_at timestamp not null, created_by varchar(255) not null, last_updated_at timestamp not null, last_updated_by varchar(255) not null, version bigint not null, access_token_validity integer not null constraint oauth_client_details_access_token_validity_check check ((access_token_validity >= '-1'::integer) AND (access_token_validity <= 253800)), client_authorities varchar(255), authorized_grant_types varchar(255), client_id varchar(255) constraint uk_clients_client_id unique, web_server_redirect_uri varchar(255), resource_ids varchar(255), scope varchar(255), scoped boolean, client_secret varchar(255), refresh_token_validity integer not null constraint oauth_client_details_refresh_token_validity_check check ((refresh_token_validity >= '-1'::integer) AND (refresh_token_validity <= 592200)), secret_required boolean );
create index idx_clients_client_id on data.oauth_client_details (client_id);
